data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Test::Farm is a general software testing framework. It works in a
    Client/Server module, where the server can receive tasks and
    dispatch tasks over a set of testing clients, the clients execute
    tasks and report the results to the server.

    When specified, a certain tasks can only be run on clients that
    meet the constraint. Tasks can also be scheduled based on work load
    or certain priorities.
